original_text: And it came to pass, that, when Abraham's servant heard their words, he worshipped the Lord, bowing himself to the earth.
korean_text: 아브라함의 종이 그들의 말을 듣고 땅에 엎드려 여호와께 절하고

sentences.original_text: that, when Abraham's servant heard their words
sentences.korean_translation: 아브라함의 종이 그들의 말을 들었을 때
